description: The Leeds Sports Pose Extended dataset contains 10,000 images gathered from Flickr searches for the tags 'parkour', 'gymnastics', and 'athletics'. The dataset consists of poses that are deemed challenging to estimate. Each image has a corresponding annotation gathered from Amazon Mechanical Turk and is not guaranteed to be highly accurate. The images have been scaled such that the annotated person is roughly 150 pixels in length. Each image has been annotated with up to 14 visible joint locations.

image_annotations.annotation_accuracy: Not guaranteed to be highly accurate
